        kṛtiriyamācāryavasubandhupādānāmiti //	kRtiH iyam AcArya vasu banDu pAdAnAm iti //
        ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /	ye Darma hetu praBavAH hetum tezAm taTAgataH hi avadat /
        teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //	tezAm ca yaH niroDaH evaMvAdI mahA ASramaNaH //
   devadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyāna sakalatathāgataśāsanadhūrddharasya	deva DarmaH ayam pravara mahAyAna sakala taTAgata SAsana DUrdDarasya
   uttarāpathikapaṇḍitasthaviraśrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyamityādi /	uttarA paTika paNxita sTavira SrI lAmAvAkasya yat atra puNyam ityAdi /
   // śubhamastu //	// SuBam astu //
